CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the View Content stage positioned above or below the Share Content stage?
SRP.A: The View Content stage is positioned {above} the Share Content stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Like or Comment?
VE.A: The value of stage Like or Comment is {183}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Share Content?
VE.A: The value of stage Share Content is {116}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Content Creation or Upload?
VE.A: The value of stage Content Creation or Upload is {52}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is View Content, with a value of {300}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Content Creation or Upload, with a value of {52}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage View Content to stage Like or Comment?
SC.A: Decreased by {117} Million Users from stage View Content to stage Like or Comment.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Like or Comment to stage Share Content?
SC.A: Decreased by {67} Million Users from stage Like or Comment to stage Share Content.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Join Group or Community to stage Content Creation or Upload?
SC.A: Decreased by {10} Million Users from stage Join Group or Community to stage Content Creation or Upload.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 91? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {View Content} stage has {300}, the {Like or Comment} stage has {183}, the {Share Content} stage has {116}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 91? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Follow Account} stage has {67}, the {Join Group or Community} stage has {62}, the {Content Creation or Upload} stage has {52}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 64 and 91? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community, or from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Join Group or Community} to {Content Creation or Upload} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload, or from stage Like or Comment to Share Content?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Like or Comment} to {Share Content} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Share Content to Follow Account, from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community, or from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Share Content} to stage {Follow Account} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {View Content} and {Like or Comment} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Follow Account} and {Join Group or Community} stages.
